category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_Structure_Partial_Context
preference.preference_description: Specifies the load behavior for loading subschedules in a master schedule context. Valid Values: 0 - Loads the full schedule, including all of the sub schedules. This value results in slower loading than other values. 1 - Partially loads all subschedules and loads them inline on demand. This value yields the best performance if there are subschedules. When you insert a schedule only the schedule summary is inserted. For Costing and EVM, if the subschedules have not been loaded, the system loads them and continues.
